attributes.additional_details:
Privatize Government by putting the governing of the UK out to tender to the bidder which offers best value.

Keep our elected officials and the democratic process but the managment of the funds would be done by a company who would be able to change employee's contracts, hourly rates, benefits, lowering 'Gold-Plated' pension arrangments and make the neccessary job cuts that would save the public purse billions a year.
